aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: defaultAdminShell

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Aspect for defining an incident in context of Environmental and Social Standards as specified by the Catena-X Sustainability team.

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Aspect for defining an incident in context of Environmental and Social Standards as specified by the Catena-X Sustainability team.
Free-text description for commodity of a product affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Description of product or component affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Part number that is affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Raw material that causes an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Industry / Branch that causes the incident
Environmental and social standards related incident category according to Supply Chain Due Diligence Act
Subcategory of an incident Category
Title/ subject of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Replaces Incident Subject for external communication
Full text description of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Incident description for external communication
Picture(s) about the reported incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
System created timestamp when the incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) was issued and saved
Date and time information when an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) occurred
Unique identifier for an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Incident ID that has been checked and validated. In case of duplicates the "parent" incident ID will be used as Master Operating Company Incident ID.
Human readable format of Incident ID
Status of incident progress, default value = new
Flag, that can be set to true in order to request to publish the incident, default value is false

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: Sub Case Operating Company Incident Ids

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Incident Ids that belong to a Master Operating Company Incident Id
System Id that defines the tenant
Name of a company / an organisation that is the originator of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Entity of an address. Model follows specification of BPDM (Business Partner Data Management).
Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.
Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.
Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.
Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values
Entity for a locality which consists of a key and a value.
Technical key of a locality
Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").
Entity for a premise which consists of a type (technical key) and a value
Technical key of a premise
Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site
Entity for a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key and a value.
Technical key of a postal delivery point
Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate
Entity definition for a country
Entity for a postcode which consists of a type plus a value
The value of a post code
The technical key of a post code
BPN-L ID of the company that causes the incident
BPN-S ID of the company that causes the incident
BPN-A ID of the company that causes the incident
Entity for geographic coordinates including a longitude and a latitude value.
Longitude information for geographic coordinates.
Latitude information for geographic coordinates.
First name of ESS incident issuer
Email address of ESS incident issuer
Phone number of ESS incident issuer
Flag that Incident issuer wants to be anonymous
System generated unique identifier of incident issuer
Entity of an address. Model follows specification of BPDM (Business Partner Data Management).
Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.
Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.
Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.
Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values
Entity for a locality which consists of a key and a value.
Technical key of a locality
Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").
Entity for a premise which consists of a type (technical key) and a value
Technical key of a premise
Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site
Entity for a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key and a value.
Technical key of a postal delivery point
Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate
Entity definition for a country
Entity for a postcode which consists of a type plus a value
The value of a post code
The technical key of a post code
Last name of ESS incident Issuer
Region within a country of ESS Originator
Region within a country of ESS Incident Issuer

Characteristic of the technical key of a thoroughfare
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a thoroughfare which can consist of a type (e.g. "STREET"), value (e.g. "Bernstra?e") and number (e.g. "45"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.
Characteristic of the technical key of a locality
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a locality which belongs to an address and which consists of a type (e.g. "CITY") and value (e.g. "Mannheim"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.
Characteristic of the technical key of a premise
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a premise which consists of a technical key (e.g. "BUILDING" or "OTHER") and a value (e.g. "Werk 1").

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: Postal Delivery Point Technical Key Characteristic

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Characteristic of the technical key of a postal delivery point
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Characteristic for defining a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key (e.g. "MAILBOX" or "OTHER") and a value. Model follows the specification of BPDM.
Characteristic of a country belonging to an address
Characteristic for the technical key of a post code
Characteristic for defining a postcode which can consist of a type (e.g. "REGULAR" for zip codes) and a value (e.g. "98765-4321"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.
A characteristic to express the postal address and which is intended to be referenced by other aspects

BPNS Business Partner Number
BPNA Business Partner Number
